Package com.intellij.lang.annotation

Interface AnnotationBuilder.FixBuilder

  • Enclosing interface:
    AnnotationBuilder

    public static interface AnnotationBuilder.FixBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AnnotationBuilder.FixBuilder batch()
      Specify that the quickfix will be available during batch mode only.
      AnnotationBuilder.FixBuilder key(HighlightDisplayKey key) 
      AnnotationBuilder.FixBuilder range(TextRange range)
      Specify the range for this quick fix.
      AnnotationBuilder registerFix()
      Finish registration of the new quickfix associated with the annotation.
      AnnotationBuilder.FixBuilder universal()
      Specify that the quickfix will be available both during batch mode and on-the-fly.

    • Method Detail

      • range

        AnnotationBuilder.FixBuilder range(TextRange range)
        Specify the range for this quick fix. If not specified, the annotation range is used. This is an intermediate method in the registering new quick fix pipeline.

      • key

        AnnotationBuilder.FixBuilder key(HighlightDisplayKey key)

      • batch

        AnnotationBuilder.FixBuilder batch()
        Specify that the quickfix will be available during batch mode only. This is an intermediate method in the registering new quick fix pipeline.

      • universal

        AnnotationBuilder.FixBuilder universal()
        Specify that the quickfix will be available both during batch mode and on-the-fly. This is an intermediate method in the registering new quick fix pipeline.

      • registerFix

        AnnotationBuilder registerFix()
        Finish registration of the new quickfix associated with the annotation. After calling this method you can continue constructing the annotation - e.g. register new fixes. For example: 
         holder.newAnnotation(range, WARNING, "Illegal element")
   .newFix(myRenameFix).key(DISPLAY_KEY).registerFix()
   .newFix(myDeleteFix).range(deleteRange).registerFix()
   .create();
